#
#  Sample text using terminal national character set suppport.
#
General format: [ISO-2022]
                [UTF-8]

#
#  Sample text based on XTerm's specs and random other docs.
#
US-ASCII:         [(B#$@[\]^_{|}~(B]
                  [#$@[\]^_{|}~]
Graphics:         [(0abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz_{|}~(B]
                  [▒␉␌␍␊°±␤␋┘┐┌└┼⎺⎻─⎼⎽├┤┴┬│≤≥_π≠£·]
British:          [(A#$@[\]^_{|}~(B]
                  [£$@[\]^_{|}~]
